g.text: check e-mails from frag.jetzt for tokens
question is worth a bonus point?
The lecturer or a moderator has given you either
the key code, the direct link or the QR code.
You are in the event room.
send e-mail with token to lecturer
Either the lecturer has added you
as a moderator in the room with your e-mail address
or you have received a temporary moderation link.
You are in the event room.
